review_data.title: Hidden gem
review_data.content: Fantastic place! Delicious food, friendly service, view on fields and horse stables. Beautiful place for walks after a meal.

review_data.title: Very nice local restaurant
review_data.content: While we lived in Zurich, our typical working week finished with dinner in restaurant Büsi. The owners are very friendly, they do the best cordon blue and Egli filet im Bierteig in town and the outside terrace provides a lovely view into the green. We...More

review_data.title: Jederzeit wieder

review_data.title: Typical Swiss restaurant
review_data.content: I came during a hot summer day just for some drinks in the shadow. The typical Swiss restaurant offers local food and an interesting menu. Due to the heat I did not eat. Service was very friendly and served inside as well as outside on...More

review_data.title: Close to Zurich Nordring, but a country feel.
review_data.content: This is a favourite of ours and just a few minutes away from the Zurich Affoltern turn off, immediately after the Gubrist tunnel when approaching from the east by car. The Dinner menu is quite extensive for a small restaurant although the Lunchtime menu is...More

review_data.title: Eine ganz normale Beiz
review_data.content: Katzen gibt's da keine! Wenn man keine allzu grossen Ansprüche hat: zufriedenstellend. Die Spätzli sind empfehlenswert.
